Package atg.b2bcommerce.approval

Interface Summary
ApprovalConstants  
 

Class Summary
ApprovalFormHandler This form handler is used in response to a request for an order approval.
ApprovalMessage  
ApprovalRequiredDroplet This droplet is used to load all the orders which require approval and whose authorized approver ids list contains the profile id contained in the approverid parameter.
ApprovalRequiredMessage This class extends the CommerceMessageImpl class.
ApprovedDroplet This droplet is used to load all the orders which have been approved and whose approver ids list contains the profile id contained in the approverid parameter.
MessagePipelineMapper This class executes a Pipeline chain upon receipt of a JMS message.
 

Exception Summary
ApprovalException This exception indicates that a severe error occured while performing an approval operation.
